CHEM 102 Summer 2022 (nearly) Class Photo

12 Aug 2022 by Murat Kahveci

Today is our last day for CHEM 102 Summer 2022 class and here is our ‘nearly class photo’. Sorry to miss some who had to leave early for other commitments.

Left to right. Back row: Sophie, Victoria, Andreea. Front row: Shaan, Megan, Nayeli, Fatima, Justin, Jake, Haydn, Jennifer, Murat.

I thank you all for your dedications and wish you a good luck in your future endeavors. If you need a letter of recommendation, please see Request for Letter of Recommendation.
